name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.search.group.hierarchy.levels
description:
The number of levels to go up the group hierarchy when determining
    which groups a user is part of. 0 Will represent checking just the
    group that the user belongs to.  Each additional level will raise the
    time it takes to execute a query by at most
    hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.directory.search.timeout.
    The default will usually be appropriate for all LDAP systems.

name: mapreduce.job.counters.max
description: The max number of user counters allowed per job.

name: dfs.namenode.handler.count
description:
The number of Namenode RPC server threads that listen to
  requests from clients.
  If dfs.namenode.servicerpc-address is not configured then
  Namenode RPC server threads listen to requests from all nodes.

name: dfs.client.read.shortcircuit.buffer.size
description: Buffer size in bytes for short-circuit local reads.

name: dfs.datanode.lazywriter.interval.sec
description: Interval in seconds for Datanodes for lazy persist writes.

name: dfs.namenode.list.reencryption.status.num.responses
description:
When listing re-encryption status, the maximum number of zones
    that will be returned in a batch. Fetching the list incrementally in
    batches improves namenode performance.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-user-done-dir.permissions
description:
The permissions of the user directories in
  ${mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-done-dir}. The user and the group
  permission must be 7, this is enforced.

name: file.bytes-per-checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  file.stream-buffer-size
